app.title: Knock Out MDE
app.description: Bespoke boxing apparel and costume design from Medellín, Colombia

home.description: Handcrafted boxing apparel and costumes designed with passion in Medellín, Colombia

about.title: About Knock Out MDE
about.description: Founded in Medellín, Knock Out MDE specializes in creating unique, high-quality boxing apparel and costume designs tailored to each fighter's personality and style.
about.craftText: We combine traditional craftsmanship with innovative design to create striking, durable apparel that stands out in the ring.
about.heritageText: Our designs draw inspiration from Colombia's rich cultural heritage and Medellín's vibrant art scene.
